name: CQ.Ext.chart.Axis
doc: Defines a CartesianChart's vertical or horizontal axis.

props.name: hideOverlappingLabels
props.doc: If true, labels that overlap previously drawn labels on the axis will be hidden.

props.name: labelFunction
props.doc:
A string reference to the globally-accessible function that may be called to
determine each of th...

props.name: labelSpacing
props.doc: The space, in pixels, between labels on an axis.

props.name: orientation
props.doc: The direction in which the axis is drawn. May be "horizontal" or "vertical".

props.name: reverse
props.doc: If true, the items on the axis will be drawn in opposite direction.
